title: Startup School 3 & Green and Digital Silk Road
organization: Center for Analysis of Economic Reforms and Communication & Enterprise Azerbaijan
description: Selected as a finalist for the 'Demo Day' in the 'Startup School 3' project, part of the 'Green and Digital Silk Road' international acceleration program. Developed the 'GuardianX' MVP from scratch, including a mobile application and a comprehensive web platform focused on AI-driven pest detection. Completed 45 hours of intensive online training led by local and international mentors, gaining expertise in product scaling, market entry, and technical roadmaps. Received specialized mentorship from Alperen Zeki Gokmen to refine the business model and pitch strategy for presentation to potential investors and business leaders.
